hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
DECLARE @CommunityId_spio varchar(8) DECLARE @JobNumber_spio varchar(8)
SELECT @CommunityId_spio = job.CommunityId, @JobNumber_spio = job.JobNumber FROM vJobSaleLookup vjsl INNER JOIN JOB_Jobs job ON vjsl.JobNumber = job.JobNumber WHERE vjsl.SaleId = :SaleId
exec JOB_PlanIncludedSelectedOptions_sel @JobNumber = @JobNumber_spio
